author: lgray
body:
Implements a 2D density-based clustering algorithm for HGCal and adds this to the local reconstruction workflow in CMSSW.

I'll post some links in a bit but using this algorithm, at least in 0PU, we get decent energy containment for photons, hadrons are a work in progress.

We've checked this in high pileup and it takes more time but does not explode. 
Can post more information on the nature of the algorithm if requested.

Attn: @emeschi
title: HGCal 2D Layer Clusters (81X)
